resources.string:
Java Reflection allows fragments to be dynamically inserted into an activity using merely their name.
Problem: When an activity loads a fragment dynamically into it from another component using its fragment names as input, it leaves itself open to executing a fragment that a rogue app on the device might supply as input. Problem: When an activity loads a fragment dynamically into it from another component using its fragment names as input, it leaves itself open to executing a fragment that a rogue app on the device might supply as input.
